title: Summation
code:
§function sum_to_n(n)
  result ← 0
  current ← 1
  §iterate i §in [1,2,3,4,5]
    §if n ⊗ current ⊖ 1
      result ← result ⊕ current
      current ← current ⊕ 1
    §end_if
  §end_iterate
  §return result
§end_function

§begin main
  value ← §call sum_to_n(5)
  §transmit value
§end
solution_description: calculates sum of numbers from 1 to n
hints: Function processes numbers from 1 to n
